objects.text:
• Multiple Drying Cycles
• Energy-Efficient Technology
• Large Capacity Drum
• Space-Saving Design

product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Compact Ventless Dryer - Modern Laundry Solution
product_details.description:
• ✨ Sleek white design with modern digital display and intuitive controls
• 🌟 Multiple drying cycles including Normal, Heavy Duty, Delicates, and Quick Dry
• ⚡ Energy-efficient ventless condensing technology
• 🎯 Precise electronic controls with LED time display
• 🔄 Large capacity drum with convenient front-loading design
• 💨 Advanced moisture sensor for optimal drying results
• 🏠 Perfect for apartments, condos, and spaces without external venting
• ⚙️ Easy-to-use control dial with multiple fabric care settings
• 🛠️ Built-in maintenance reminder system
• 📏 Space-saving compact design without compromising performance

banner_details:
This banner presents a promotional advertisement for a product, with a clean and modern layout. It features a bold header ("heading") and a strong subheader ("subheading"), both in uppercase white fonts for high contrast against a dark-to-light diagonal gradient background. The left side of the banner contains a list of product features ("description"), followed by a prominent price display ("price") in large, thick typography to capture attention. Below it, a rectangular call-to-action button ("cta_button") with contrasting text ("cta") invites user interaction. The right side is dominated by a clear product image ("product_image"), ensuring the product remains the central focus.

**Color Palette**:
- Dark Blue: `#0b3d69`
- Medium Blue: `#1a5f8d`
- Light Blue: `#2981b3`
- Pale Blue/Background Accent: `#e8f4f8`, `#d1e9f3`, `#c0e0ee`
- White: `#ffffff`
product_color: The product image highlights a modern and minimalist aesthetic. Dominated by a clean white base (#F5F5F5), the appliance is accented by bold black (#1C1C1C) detailing on the door and display panel. The digital display introduces a bright blue (#00CFFF) and soft white (#FFFFFF) contrast to draw attention. Flush chrome and steely gray tones (#B0B0B0) around the dial add a tactile, metallic feel, blending sophistication with functionality. The color transitions are sharp yet cohesive, emphasizing the product’s sleek design. For an advertisement banner, using a cool, neutral palette with accent highlights—white, black, chrome silver, and blue—will ensure clarity and focus on the product.
